___repos.description: Which projects to display in the grid.

___resource.description: The name of the projects resource, a list of repository resources

___events.description: Which events to display in the grid.

___resource.description: The name of the events resource to pull events from

___types.description: The types of events that should be listed (all other events will be ignored)

___fields.description: The list of JSON pointers (or paths) pointing to object members to match.

___resource.description: The name of the resource to subscribe to for search queries.

___match.description: A mapping from regular expressions to field lists. The last matching group will be searched in the corresponding object members.

additionalProperties.description: The list of JSON pointers similar to the 'fields' list.

name: activity-grid-widget
description: Display repository activity for multiple projects in a grid
